content: TITLE: Defining AutoImportResolver for PrimeVue Components in TypeScript DESCRIPTION: This code defines the AutoImportResolver class with a resolveImport method. It includes a comprehensive list of PrimeVue components and their corresponding import paths. The resolver is used to automatically import components in PrimeVue projects. SOURCE: https://github.com/primefaces/primevue/blob/master/packages/auto-import-resolver/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: typescript CODE: ``` import { AutoImportResolver } from '@nuxt/schema'; export default { resolveImport(name: string) { const components = { // Core PrimeVue: '@/presets/primevue', PrimeVueConfig: '@/presets/primevue', // Form AutoComplete: '@/components/autocomplete/AutoComplete.vue', Calendar: '@/components/calendar/Calendar.vue', CascadeSelect: '@/components/cascadeselect/CascadeSelect.vue', Checkbox: '@/components/checkbox/Checkbox.vue', Chips: '@/components/chips/Chips.vue', ColorPicker: '@/components/colorpicker/ColorPicker.vue', Dropdown: '@/components/dropdown/Dropdown.vue', Editor: '@/components/editor/Editor.vue', InputMask: '@/components/inputmask/InputMask.vue', InputNumber: '@/components/inputnumber/InputNumber.vue', InputSwitch: '@/components/inputswitch/InputSwitch.vue', InputText: '@/components/inputtext/InputText.vue', Knob: '@/components/knob/Knob.vue', Listbox: '@/components/listbox/Listbox.vue', MultiSelect: '@/components/multiselect/MultiSelect.vue', Password: '@/components/password/Password.vue', RadioButton: '@/components/radiobutton/RadioButton.vue', Rating: '@/components/rating/Rating.vue', SelectButton: '@/components/selectbutton/SelectButton.vue', Slider: '@/components/slider/Slider.vue', Textarea: '@/components/textarea/Textarea.vue', ToggleButton: '@/components/togglebutton/ToggleButton.vue', TreeSelect: '@/components/treeselect/TreeSelect.vue', TriStateCheckbox: '@/components/tristatecheckbox/TriStateCheckbox.vue', // Button Button: '@/components/button/Button.vue', SpeedDial: '@/components/speeddial/SpeedDial.vue', SplitButton: '@/components/splitbutton/SplitButton.vue', // Data Column: '@/components/column/Column.vue', ColumnGroup: '@/components/columngroup/ColumnGroup.vue', DataTable: '@/components/datatable/DataTable.vue', DataView: '@/components/dataview/DataView.vue', DataViewLayoutOptions: '@/components/dataviewlayoutoptions/DataViewLayoutOptions.vue', OrderList: '@/components/orderlist/OrderList.vue', OrganizationChart: '@/components/organizationchart/OrganizationChart.vue', Paginator: '@/components/paginator/Paginator.vue', PickList: '@/components/picklist/PickList.vue', Timeline: '@/components/timeline/Timeline.vue', Tree: '@/components/tree/Tree.vue', TreeTable: '@/components/treetable/TreeTable.vue', VirtualScroller: '@/components/virtualscroller/VirtualScroller.vue', // Panel Accordion: '@/components/accordion/Accordion.vue', AccordionTab: '@/components/accordiontab/AccordionTab.vue', Card: '@/components/card/Card.vue', DeferredContent: '@/components/deferredcontent/DeferredContent.vue', Divider: '@/components/divider/Divider.vue', Fieldset: '@/components/fieldset/Fieldset.vue', Panel: '@/components/panel/Panel.vue', ScrollPanel: '@/components/scrollpanel/ScrollPanel.vue', Splitter: '@/components/splitter/Splitter.vue', SplitterPanel: '@/components/splitterpanel/SplitterPanel.vue', TabView: '@/components/tabview/TabView.vue', TabPanel: '@/components/tabpanel/TabPanel.vue', Toolbar: '@/components/toolbar/Toolbar.vue', // Overlay ConfirmDialog: '@/components/confirmdialog/ConfirmDialog.vue', ConfirmPopup: '@/components/confirmpopup/ConfirmPopup.vue', Dialog: '@/components/dialog/Dialog.vue', DynamicDialog: '@/components/dynamicdialog/DynamicDialog.vue', OverlayPanel: '@/components/overlaypanel/OverlayPanel.vue', Sidebar: '@/components/sidebar/Sidebar.vue', Tooltip: '@/directives/tooltip', // File FileUpload: '@/components/fileupload/FileUpload.vue', // Menu Breadcrumb: '@/components/breadcrumb/Breadcrumb.vue', ContextMenu: '@/components/contextmenu/ContextMenu.vue', Dock: '@/components/dock/Dock.vue', MegaMenu: '@/components/megamenu/MegaMenu.vue', Menu: '@/components/menu/Menu.vue', Menubar: '@/components/menubar/Menubar.vue', PanelMenu: '@/components/panelmenu/PanelMenu.vue', Steps: '@/components/steps/Steps.vue', TabMenu: '@/components/tabmenu/TabMenu.vue', TieredMenu: '@/components/tieredmenu/TieredMenu.vue', // Chart Chart: '@/components/chart/Chart.vue', // Messages Message: '@/components/message/Message.vue', InlineMessage: '@/components/inlinemessage/InlineMessage.vue', Toast: '@/components/toast/Toast.vue', // Media Carousel: '@/components/carousel/Carousel.vue', Galleria: '@/components/galleria/Galleria.vue', Image: '@/components/image/Image.vue', // Misc Avatar: '@/components/avatar/Avatar.vue', AvatarGroup: '@/components/avatargroup/AvatarGroup.vue', Badge: '@/components/badge/Badge.vue', BlockUI: '@/components/blockui/BlockUI.vue', Chip: '@/components/chip/Chip.vue', Inplace: '@/components/inplace/Inplace.vue', ProgressBar: '@/components/progressbar/ProgressBar.vue', ProgressSpinner: '@/components/progressspinner/ProgressSpinner.vue', ScrollTop: '@/components/scrolltop/ScrollTop.vue', Skeleton: '@/components/skeleton/Skeleton.vue', Tag: '@/components/tag/Tag.vue', Terminal: '@/components/terminal/Terminal.vue', // Directives Ripple: '@/directives/ripple', StyleClass: '@/directives/styleclass', Badge: '@/directives/badge', Tooltip: '@/directives/tooltip', // Services and Utils FilterService: '@/api/FilterService', TerminalService: '@/api/TerminalService', ToastService: '@/api/ToastService', PrimeVueConfirmDialogService: '@/api/PrimeVueConfirmDialogService' }; return components[name as keyof typeof components]; } } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring PrimeVue Nuxt Module in Nuxt Config DESCRIPTION: This snippet shows how to add the @primevue/nuxt-module to the modules section of the Nuxt configuration file (nuxt.config.js or nuxt.config.ts). SOURCE: https://github.com/primefaces/primevue/blob/master/packages/nuxt-module/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: javascript CODE: ``` { modules: ['@primevue/nuxt-module']; } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Using Custom SVG Icons in PrimeVue Components DESCRIPTION: This code snippet shows how to use custom SVG icons in PrimeVue components. It demonstrates the usage of the 'icon' template for customization. SOURCE: https://github.com/primefaces/primevue/blob/master/packages/icons/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_4 LANGUAGE: html CODE: ``` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Using PrimeVue Icons in HTML DESCRIPTION: This snippet shows how to use PrimeVue Icons in HTML. It demonstrates the usage of the 'pi' class along with specific icon classes. SOURCE: https://github.com/primefaces/primevue/blob/master/packages/icons/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: html CODE: ``` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Importing PrimeVue Icons CSS in JavaScript DESCRIPTION: This code demonstrates how to import the PrimeVue Icons CSS file in a JavaScript file. This step is necessary to use the icons in your project. SOURCE: https://github.com/primefaces/primevue/blob/master/packages/icons/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: javascript CODE: ``` import 'primeicons/primeicons.css'; ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Installing PrimeVue Icons via npm DESCRIPTION: This snippet shows how to install PrimeVue Icons using npm. It's a prerequisite for using PrimeVue Icons in a project. SOURCE: https://github.com/primefaces/primevue/blob/master/packages/icons/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` npm install primeicons ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Installing PrimeVue Nuxt Module via NPX DESCRIPTION: This command adds the @primevue/nuxt-module dependency to your Nuxt project using npx. SOURCE: https://github.com/primefaces/primevue/blob/master/packages/nuxt-module/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` npx nuxi@latest module add primevue ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Customizing PrimeVue Icon Size in CSS DESCRIPTION: This CSS snippet demonstrates how to customize the size of PrimeVue Icons. It uses the 'font-size' property to adjust the icon size. SOURCE: https://github.com/primefaces/primevue/blob/master/packages/icons/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: css CODE: ``` .custom-icon { font-size: 2rem; } ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Configuring Color Variables for Volt Theme in SCSS DESCRIPTION: Defines primary color variables and their shades for the Volt theme. These variables are used throughout the theme to maintain consistent coloring. SOURCE: https://github.com/primefaces/primevue/blob/master/apps/volt/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: SCSS CODE: ``` $primaryColor: #4318FF !default; $primaryLightColor: #5B3BFF !default; $primaryDarkColor: #3311DB !default; $primaryDarkerColor: #2200B7 !default; $primaryTextColor: #ffffff !default; $highlightBg: #EFF1FF !default; $highlightTextColor: $primaryDarkerColor !default; $success: #05CD99 !default; $info: #3965FF !default; $warning: #FFB547 !default; $help: #8884D8 !default; $danger: #FF5566 !default; ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Setting up Font Variables for Volt Theme in SCSS DESCRIPTION: Configures font-related variables including family, weight, and size for the Volt theme. These settings ensure consistent typography across the theme. SOURCE: https://github.com/primefaces/primevue/blob/master/apps/volt/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: SCSS CODE: ``` //fonts $fontFamily: "DM Sans",sans-serif !default; $fontSize: 1rem !default; $fontWeight: 400 !default; $textColor: #2B3674 !default; $textSecondaryColor: #8F9BBA !default; $borderRadius: 16px !default; $transitionDuration: .2s !default; $formElementTransition: background-color $transitionDuration, color $transitionDuration, border-color $transitionDuration, box-shadow $transitionDuration !default; $actionIconTransition: background-color $transitionDuration, color $transitionDuration, box-shadow $transitionDuration !default; $listItemTransition: background-color $transitionDuration, border-color $transitionDuration, box-shadow $transitionDuration !default; $primeIconFontSize: 1rem !default; $divider: 1px solid #E9EDF7 !default; $inlineSpacing: .5rem !default; $disabledOpacity: .6 !default; $maskBg: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4) !default; $loadingIconFontSize: 2rem !default; $errorColor: #FF5566 !default; //accordion $accordionSpacing: 0 !default; $accordionHeaderBorder: 1px solid #E9EDF7 !default; $accordionHeaderBg: #ffffff !default; $accordionHeaderTextColor: $textColor !default; $accordionHeaderFontWeight: 700 !default; $accordionHeaderHoverBg: #ffffff !default; $accordionHeaderHoverTextColor: $textColor !default; $accordionHeaderHoverBorderColor: #E9EDF7 !default; $accordionHeaderActiveBg: #ffffff !default; $accordionHeaderActiveBorderColor: #E9EDF7 !default; $accordionHeaderActiveTextColor: $primaryColor !default; $accordionHeaderActiveHoverBg: #ffffff !default; $accordionHeaderActiveHoverBorderColor: #E9EDF7 !default; $accordionHeaderActiveHoverTextColor: $primaryColor !default; $accordionHeaderTransition: border-color $transitionDuration, background-color $transitionDuration, color $transitionDuration, box-shadow $transitionDuration !default; $accordionContentBorder: 1px solid #E9EDF7 !default; $accordionContentBg: #ffffff !default; $accordionContentTextColor: $textColor !default; $accordionContentPadding: 1.25rem !default; $accordionToggleAspectRatio: 1 !default; ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Issue References in Markdown DESCRIPTION: Markdown formatted GitHub issue references with links and descriptions of bugs and enhancements. SOURCE: https://github.com/primefaces/primevue/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-23_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` - MultiSelect: missing loadingIcon passthrough option in documentation [\#5964](https://github.com/primefaces/primevue/issues/5964) - [Core]: PrimeVue 4 is causing a memory leak [\#5957](https://github.com/primefaces/primevue/issues/5957) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Version History Links in Markdown DESCRIPTION: Markdown links to version histories and changelogs for different PrimeVue 4.0 pre-release versions. SOURCE: https://github.com/primefaces/primevue/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-23_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` ## [4.0.0-rc.3](https://github.com/primefaces/primevue/tree/4.0.0-rc.3) (2024-06-27) [Full Changelog](https://github.com/primefaces/primevue/compare/4.0.0-rc.2...4.0.0-rc.3) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: PrimeVue Changelog Entry DESCRIPTION: Markdown formatted changelog entries detailing version releases, feature enhancements, and bug fixes for PrimeVue component library. SOURCE: https://github.com/primefaces/primevue/blob/master/CHANGELOG_ARCHIVE.md#2025-04-23_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` ## [3.7.2](https://github.com/primefaces/primevue/tree/3.7.2) (2021-09-15) [Full Changelog](https://github.com/primefaces/primevue/compare/3.7.1...3.7.2) **Implemented New Features and Enhancements:** - Incorrect Sizing due to filter input width of dropdown [#1519](https://github.com/primefaces/primevue/issues/1519) - Tooltip: word wrap [#1512](https://github.com/primefaces/primevue/issues/1512) - Add getFormatter method to InputNumber [#1509](https://github.com/primefaces/primevue/issues/1509) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: PrimeVue Version Headers DESCRIPTION: Release version headers with links to GitHub repositories and changelog comparisons SOURCE: https://github.com/primefaces/primevue/blob/master/CHANGELOG_ARCHIVE.md#2025-04-23_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` ## [3.16.0](https://github.com/primefaces/primevue/tree/3.16.0) (2022-08-15) [Full Changelog](https://github.com/primefaces/primevue/compare/3.15.0...3.16.0) ## [3.15.0](https://github.com/primefaces/primevue/tree/3.15.0) (2022-06-15) [Full Changelog](https://github.com/primefaces/primevue/compare/3.13.1...3.15.0) ## [3.13.1](https://github.com/primefaces/primevue/tree/3.13.1) (2022-06-07) [Full Changelog](https://github.com/primefaces/primevue/compare/3.13.0...3.13.1) ## [3.13.0](https://github.com/primefaces/primevue/tree/3.13.0) (2022-06-06) [Full Changelog](https://github.com/primefaces/primevue/compare/3.12.6...3.13.0) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Issue Links in Markdown DESCRIPTION: Markdown formatted GitHub issue references with descriptions and links SOURCE: https://github.com/primefaces/primevue/blob/master/CHANGELOG_ARCHIVE.md#2025-04-23_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` **Implemented New Features and Enhancements:** - Improve `usePassThrough` method [\#4289](https://github.com/primefaces/primevue/issues/4289) - SelectButton: passthrough option [\#4286](https://github.com/primefaces/primevue/issues/4286) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Version Links in Markdown DESCRIPTION: Markdown links to version changelog comparisons on GitHub SOURCE: https://github.com/primefaces/primevue/blob/master/CHANGELOG_ARCHIVE.md#2025-04-23_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` ## [3.32.1](https://github.com/primefaces/primevue/tree/3.32.1) (2023-08-18) [Full Changelog](https://github.com/primefaces/primevue/compare/3.32.0...3.32.1) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Markdown Header for PrimeVue Metadata DESCRIPTION: Simple markdown heading indicating the PrimeVue metadata documentation section. SOURCE: https://github.com/primefaces/primevue/blob/master/packages/metadata/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` # PrimeVue MetaData ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: PrimeVue Forms Header in Markdown DESCRIPTION: A simple markdown header for the PrimeVue Forms documentation section. This heading would typically introduce the forms-related components and functionality available in the PrimeVue UI library for Vue.js. SOURCE: https://github.com/primefaces/primevue/blob/master/packages/forms/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: markdown CODE: ``` # PrimeVue Forms ```
